body:
@pauljb336:
Wait? Do you think the doujin groups are posting their stuff here?
How are they supposed to even see your opinion?
Do you think they check hundreds of doujin sites, not even in their own language to see what people think of their work?
Love Mako chan! Love how these sailor senshis love getting fucked by men twice their age and show their true slutty selves! 👅

I don't know who's idea these guys were, but I've been seeing them in several hentais now. They're better than other "big ugly men" types, but I would still rather have youma. That's just my opinion. It's good to see Jupiter here, but next time pair her up with another girl. Mercury and Jupiter get together with the men. That's just a recommendation.
